name: Galactic Below
description:
This is a space invader inspired shooter with colorful explosions and 5 levels. It's fast-paced and pretty hard. It's also super super fun!! tweet your highscore out at the end of each level.

This is one of many great games that are coming out for us check our website out for more games http://www.upperechelongames.com the game is only 0.99 so you cant loose hop in and join the fun
